be.docarch.odt2braille.addon
Class SettingsIO

java.lang.Object
  be.docarch.odt2braille.addon.SettingsIO

public class SettingsIO
extends java.lang.Object

This class has methods to save/load settings to/from

  • OpenOffice.org, or
  • the OpenOffice.org Writer document.

Author:
Bert Frees
See Also:
Settings

loadSettingsFromDocument

public Settings loadSettingsFromDocument(Settings defaultSettings)
                                  throws com.sun.star.uno.Exception
Load settings from the OpenOffice.org Writer document. The settings are stored in the document as user-defined meta-data.

Parameters:
defaultSettings - The default settings.
Returns:
The settings loaded from the document. If a setting cannot be loaded, the default setting is chosen.
Throws:
com.sun.star.uno.Exception

setProperty

private void setProperty(java.lang.String property,
                         java.lang.Object valueAfterChange,
                         java.lang.Object valueBeforeChange)
                  throws com.sun.star.uno.Exception
Write a String, Double or Boolean property to the OpenOffice document, but only if the new property value differs from the old value.

Parameters:
property - The property name.
valueAfterChange - The new property value (after the settings are changed).
valueBeforeChange - The old property value (before the settings are changed).
Throws:
com.sun.star.uno.Exception

saveSettingsToDocument

public void saveSettingsToDocument(Settings settingsAfterChange,
                                   Settings settingsBeforeChange)
                            throws com.sun.star.uno.Exception
Save settings to the OpenOffice.org Writer document. The settings are stored in the document as user-defined meta-data.

Parameters:
settingsAfterChange - The new settings.
settingsBeforeChange - The old settings.
Throws:
com.sun.star.uno.Exception

loadSettingsFromOpenOffice

public java.lang.String[] loadSettingsFromOpenOffice(java.lang.String fileName,
                                                     java.lang.String[] settingNames)
                                              throws java.io.IOException
Load settings from OpenOffice.org. The settings are stored in a .settings file in the OpenOffice.org extension (.oxt).

Parameters:
fileName - The name of the .settings file
settingNames - An array of setting names.
Returns:
An array of the respective setting values or null if the setting is not found. This array has the same lenght as settingNames
Throws:
java.io.IOException

saveSettingsToOpenOffice

public void saveSettingsToOpenOffice(java.lang.String fileName,
                                     java.lang.String[] settingNames,
                                     java.lang.String[] settingValues)
                              throws java.io.IOException
Save settings to OpenOffice.org. The settings are stored in a .settings file in the OpenOffice.org extension (.oxt).

Parameters:
fileName - The name of the .settings file
settingNames - An array of setting names.
settingValues - An array of the respective setting values. This array must have the same lenght as settingNames
Throws:
java.io.IOException
